attributes.action: Mr B A Bishop & Mrs E D Bishop
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to draw attention to the proposed change of use of the swimming pool at Noth West Kent College Oakfield Lane Dartford, to enlarged drama facilities. The pool is used by schools, clubs and pensioners, which is all in line with the Goverments policy of  Health for Britain, and will be a great loss to the users

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action, not your name. Please resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
